barker_notes.barker_summary: Costs of court in case of Keep v. Groce, May 10, 1826.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Costs of court in case of Keep v. Groce, May 10, 1826.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Imla Keep*/person_mentioned* vs *person_mentioned*Jared E Groce*/person_mentioned* */p**p**person_mentioned*Jared E Groce Dr.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sectys fees*/p*
*p*To amt fees for decision of the Judge for trial and order-------$2.*/p*
*p*" " " " Writs of summons for *person_mentioned*Witnesses */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Jurors */person_mentioned*8 a 2 1/2 bitts each------------------------------------------------------- 2.50*/p*
*p*"" "" " for 2 Certified Copies of the Complaint and order for trial--------------- 6. —*/p* *p*"" " *' for a list of *person_mentioned*Colonists */person_mentioned*furnished the *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*for to draw *person_mentioned*Jurors*/person_mentioned*______________________ 1. —*/p*
*p*" " "" for Copies of *person_mentioned*James Brown*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*L. W. Groce*/person_mentioned*s despositions------------------------------------ 6. —*/p* *p*" " fee for writing down the evidence 8 sheets a 1$___._ $8*/p* *p*" " 6 days service a 3.25c ------------------------19.50*/p* *p*27.50*/p* *p*"" "" "" decision of the *person_mentioned*Council */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Jury */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Judge */person_mentioned*2 sheets at $1___ 2. —*/p*
*p*"" " " order for the delivery of the *person_mentioned*Negroes*/person_mentioned*_________________ 62 1/2c*/p*
*p*"" " " for the Judgment passed by the *person_mentioned*Superior Judge*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* ----------------------------- 2. —*/p* *p*$49. 62 1/2*/p* *p*"" "" "" for 18 sheets paper a 6 1/4c ---------------------------- 1.12 1/2*/p*
*p*$50. 75*/p* *p**location_mentioned*Sn Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-10-1826"> May 10th 1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p* */div1*
